precomputed_serialized_matrices.name: ptk_rel_sum
precomputed_serialized_matrices.description: sum of ptk matrix constructed using kelp for questions and answers separately

precomputed_serialized_matrices.name: sst_rel_sum
precomputed_serialized_matrices.description: sum of sst-const matrix constructed using kelp for questions and answers separately

precomputed_serialized_matrices.name: cross_bow
precomputed_serialized_matrices.description: cross-pair matrix based on bag of words. It is a sum of gram matrices, where each gram matrix is constructed by applying a linear kernel to the normalized bag-of-ngram representation of texts. There are 23 variants of different n-grams overall.
